participant_1.name: David
participant_1.personality: David is a friendly and approachable person who values family above all else. He has a practical mindset and enjoys hands-on work.
participant_1.background: i have three children. my wife and kids are the best. my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate. i'm a plumber.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Sarah is nurturing and patient, always looking for beauty in nature. She enjoys teaching and sharing knowledge with her students.
participant_2.background: i enjoy gardening and walking outdoors. i've a dogs. i work as a school teacher. i'm a woman.
